title: verify set action(block) for each profile of dlp policy
custom_summary: verify set action(block) for each profile of dlp policy
custom_preconds:
1. tenant webui should accessible
2. client should be up and running.
custom_steps:
steps:
1. login to tenant webui
2. go to policies -> Inline -> New policy
3. click public app access or DLP tab from dropdown menu
4. select any app
5. select multipe profiles
6. set action as block for each profile
custom_expected:
1.File upload/download should be successful in alert and blocked in block case
2.The action generates an alert and block
3.The block alert generated should hit the correct DLP rule as per the source file 
4.The object type is file and activity should be upload 
5.The block and alert and skopeIT event should contain proper object , object_id , device , OS , browser , From user , Alert type 
, alert , action generated , alert name , policy name
